title: Rising from Ashes
content: The Conclave's archives were Elara's sanctuary, but also her prison. She spent nights cross-referencing Valerius' notes with forbidden texts, finding patterns in the alchemical symbols that hinted at a hidden society within the institution. Her discovery of the Catalyst's true nature—a crystalline essence drawn from starlight—was met with skepticism until she found evidence of Valerius' final experiment: a half-completed transmutation circle in his workshop. The clues led her to an abandoned tower on the edge of Conclave grounds, where beneath loose floorboards lay a journal describing how the Catalyst could be weaponized to control elemental magic itself.
summary: Elara uncovers evidence of Valerius' secret experiments and discovers the true power of the Catalyst.
